sentences.en: FAD ( flavin adenine dinucleotide ) A derivative of riboflavin that is a coenzyme in electron - transfer reactions.
sentences.cn: 黄素腺嘌呤二核苷酸 ( FAD ):核黄素的衍生物,在电子传递反应中是一种辅酶,它作为各种脱氢酶的辅助基团起作用.

sentences.en: Flavin: Any of a class of organic compounds, pale yellow biological pigments that fluoresce green.
sentences.cn: 黄素: 一组浅黄 、 绿萤光生物色素,在植物和动物组织中分布很广,含量少.

sentences.en: FMN ( flavin mononucleotide ) A derivative of riboflavin that is a coenzyme in electron - transfer reactions.
sentences.cn: 黄素单核苷酸 ( FMN ):核黄素的衍生物,在电子传递反应中是一种辅酶,作为多种脱氢酶的辅助因子起作用.

sentences.en: One is the flavin adenine dinucleotide ( FAD ), and the second is methenyltetrahydropteroylployglutamate ( MTHF ).
sentences.cn: 大肠杆菌photolyase含有两个辅基,分别为黄素腺嘌呤二核苷酸 ( FAD ) 和次甲基四氢叶酸 ( MTHF ).
